member.name: M:MVCBootstrap.EntityFramework.Repository`1.ReadAll
member.summary: Reads all elements. To avoid instantiating all elements, use LINQ to specify the needed elements and use the ToList() method to fetch those elements and only those from the database.

member.name: M:MVCBootstrap.EntityFramework.Repository`1.ReadOne(ApplicationBoilerplate.DataProvider.ISpecification{`0})
member.summary: Read one and only one element that matches the specification.

member.name: M:MVCBootstrap.EntityFramework.Repository`1.ReadMany(ApplicationBoilerplate.DataProvider.ISpecification{`0})
member.summary: Read the elements that match the specification.
member.param: The specification for the elements wanted.
